fingerprint.description: Your license will be locked to this machine. Get the fingerprint from Flyto2 app.

why.crossPlatformDesc: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux without modification. One codebase, everywhere.
why.offlineDesc: No internet required after installation. Your data stays local and private.
why.pythonDesc: Built for modern Python with full type hints and async support. Clean, readable code.
why.subtitle: Built for developers who value simplicity and control

footer.tagline: Automation that works like you do. Record once, replay forever.

counter.replayForeverDesc: Run it again with different data. Batch process hundreds of items.
counter.stayInControlDesc: Pause, verify, and resume anytime. Never worry about runaway automation.
counter.recordOnceDesc: Show Flyto2 how you work. It learns by watching your clicks and keystrokes.

hero.description: Flyto2 is an automation tool that operates your computer like a human. Open browsers, click buttons, fill forms, upload files. You do it once, Flyto2 repeats it forever.

why.subtitle: Many tasks aren't hard, they're just tedious.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your cloud plan at any time. For offline licenses, you can upgrade by paying the difference.
faq.a2: Your workflows continue to work indefinitely. You only lose access to updates and support. Renew anytime to get the latest features.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.
faq.a4: Absolutely! The open source core is MIT licensed. You can use it for any purpose, including commercial projects.
faq.q2: What happens when my offline license expires?
faq.q4: Can I use the free version commercially?

hero.subtitle: Automate your browser workflows. Works offline, your data stays private.
